author: BMN Gaming
comment: Sittin' in a parked car We don't even fight no more We don't even touch no more Used to be my best friend We don't even laugh no more Barely even talk no more You wanna hold my hand and then you won't You say you love me then you don't You keeping me running and running around If I'm not all you need Then just set me free I'm down on my knees If you're not the one for me Then just let me be I'm begging you please I'm praying for closed doors and open windows I'll follow where the wind blows Don't be scared to leave If I'm not all you need Then just set me free I'm down on my knees, tonight We used to go out on dates Now you don't wanna go no place It feels like we're stuck in one place I wish I could read your mind Instead I gotta read your eyes Oh, why… Thx me later!
